homegear-event.paletteHelp: Outputs all events transmitted from Homegear to Node-BLUE.
homegear-event.help: This node outputs all events transmitted from Homegear to Node-BLUE. The output payload is of type Struct and has two keys: type and data. Possible values for type are: deviceVariableEvent, flowVariableEvent, globalVariableEvent, newDevices, deleteDevices and updateDevice. The value of data depends on type. It is always an Array.
